reviewText:
Quirky point and click adventure game from 1C Wireless.
I was relatively unfamiliar with the russian cartoon series but most of the games direction is done with visual suggestion rather then voiced. Some of the humour may not be for everyone and puzzles occasionally confusing, but overall it's perfectly playable and enjoyable for people who speak english. :]

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cuGor_CMjfU
voteText: 40 of 47 people (85%) found this review helpful

reviewText: This is a game of my childhood and the funny thing is...I have a hard time playing it. It is tricky but managable, at least most of the time. :P The presentation is charming and the music sounds funny/weird which fits the game perfectly. I can recommend this game if you are looking for an exotic point and click adventure, since its east european style is charming and unique. I needed around 70-80 minutes to finish the game, but with help since I really was impatient. The game is clunky gameplaywise and you could get annoyed after a while I guess. Anyway, it is cheap and at least worth a try if you are into something different.
